title: Unjustified leaverbuster message [Is it possible?]
body: Earlier I received a leaverbuster message about my recent inactivity and AFK,the thing is i have not left a game or been inactive in game in quite a while and know of no reason to trigger this message,is it possible to receive such a message by "accident"?

replies.body: It's not likely to see that kind of message without the client detecting a history of leaves, but it definitely wouldn't be the first time I've seen it happen. As long as you aren't actively leaving games, you shouldn't have anything to worry about!
